item.title: Hugo
item.description: OK, i finally got my domain name blacksails.io. So i thought that i’d better start writing. First things first I need a place to start writing stuff. I heard that static site generators are what the cool kids does. Actually I experimented with Jekyll some time ago, but I never really got that much into it. Since then I have been writing a lot of go so I thought why not try a static site generator written in go – hugo.
